    • insertBottle

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId insertBottle(Wall wall, Cellar cellar, Bottle bottle, EmplacementBottle emplacementBottle) throws BadArgumentsException
      Insert a bottle to a cellar.
      Parameters:
      wall - The wall to add the bottle to.
      cellar - The cellar to add the bottle to.
      bottle - The bottle to insert.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement of the bottle.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the update was successful, otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

    • getBottlesFromCellar

      public List<Bottle> getBottlesFromCellar(org.bson.types.ObjectId cellarId) throws NotFoundException
      Get all bottles from a cellar.
      Parameters:
      cellarId - The id of the cellar to get the bottles from. The cellar must exist.
      Returns:
      A list of all bottles from the cellar if there is at least one, otherwise throws NotFoundException.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException

    • updateBottle

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId updateBottle(Wall wall, Cellar cellar, Bottle bottle, EmplacementBottle emplacementBottle, Bottle updatedBottle) throws BadArgumentsException
      Update a bottle in a cellar.
      Parameters:
      wall - The wall to update the bottle in.
      cellar - The cellar to update the bottle in.
      bottle - The bottle to update.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement of the bottle.
      updatedBottle - The updated bottle.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the update was successful, otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - If the update was not successful.

    • getSetOnUpdate

      protected org.bson.conversions.Bson getSetOnUpdate(Bottle entity)
      Description copied from class: AbstractMongoDao
      Function used in updateOne() to set the fields to update. Must be implemented in the child class.
      Specified by:
      getSetOnUpdate in class AbstractMongoDao<Bottle>
      Returns:
      the Bson object to use in updateOne(). Must be something like this : Updates.combine( Updates.set("runtime", 99), Updates.addToSet("genres", "Sports"), Updates.currentTimestamp("lastUpdated"));
